rows.label: qst106008_msg0001
rows.name: Now, let's begin the second period, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0002
rows.name:
The second period is a class
on observation skills, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0003
rows.name:
Three Nopon will now greet
you. Your task is to guess
which one is the merchant, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0004
rows.name: Nice to meet you, mo. I'm Rurumu, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0005
rows.name: Yo, my name is Kalukalu, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0006
rows.name: Nice to meet you, mo! I'm Yatata, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0007
rows.name:
Now, there is one merchant among
them. Who do you think it is, mo?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0008
rows.name: Who is the merchant?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0009
rows.name: Rurumu

rows.label: qst106008_msg0010
rows.name: Kalukalu

rows.label: qst106008_msg0011
rows.name: Yatata

rows.label: qst106008_msg0012
rows.name:
Unfortunately, that's incorrect,
mo. Please try again, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0013
rows.name: Correct, mo! You have a good eye, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0014
rows.name:
However, the next one will
be even more difficult, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0015
rows.name: My name is Beltran.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0016
rows.name: I'm Brass. Remember it.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0017
rows.name: Nice to meet you. My name is Shilo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0018
rows.name:
Now, who posed when they
introduced themselves, mo?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0019
rows.name: Who was it that posed?

rows.label: qst106008_msg0020
rows.name: Brass

rows.label: qst106008_msg0021
rows.name: Beltran

rows.label: qst106008_msg0022
rows.name: Shilo

rows.label: qst106008_msg0023
rows.name:
Unfortunately, that's incorrect,
mo. Please try again, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0024
rows.name: Correct, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0025
rows.name:
As expected, Hana-san, you have
wonderful observation skills, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0026
rows.name:
Paying attention to the
smallest details and not
missing any changes...

rows.label: qst106008_msg0027
rows.name:
...this skill of observation
is also important for learning
various things, mo.

rows.label: qst106008_msg0028
rows.name:
Please continue to polish
your observation skills, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0029
rows.name: Yes, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0030
rows.name:
Well then, let's do our best in the
next period, the third period, mo!

rows.label: qst106008_msg0031
rows.name:
Well then, next is third
period! Keep up good work!
